title: Can you nerf Nid enough that I feel like I actually earned kills on her?
body:
Cause if she wasn't so troll and overpowered, she would probably be pretty damn fun.  

(Yes I know troll and overpowered is fun to alot of people, as evidenced by however many downvotes this collects)

replies.body: I kinda feel like the only way to do bad with her is to get greedy, otherwise you don't get caught without some serious engage or a pick or something.
I blame the other team when a Nid goes crazy.  People are too scared to bring the fight to Nid, but that is exactly what you have to do.  Engage on her so she can't poke ya down.
She's easy to stomp with. However, if she doesn't stomp, she'll be pretty crappy lategame and lose.

She shouldn't be like this.  If you play a bunch of non-op champs and then jump on Nid for a couple games, it's downright sad how easily you can destroy people compared to the vast majority of the roster.  Her dmg is huge, her mana costs are low, most of her cooldowns are low, and she was given a nonsensical bonus to her passive to allow her to take practically no damage while farming the jungle.  It just makes no sense at all.

Repent her, she's a no-skill champino and she can do anything she wants. I stomp on her as my zac, but it disgusts me to see what she does to my teammates who try their best to use champinos that aren't so damn overpowered and low-tier. You want to earn your kills? You cant find that satisfaction with using nidalee, because her kit is meant for people who just want to earn easy kills
